field.label: Default
field.help: Sets this check IP service to be used as the default.

field.label: Name
field.help: The service name may only consist of the characters "a-z, A-Z, 0-9 and _". And may not be "DynDNS" (the factory default service).

field.label: Verify SSL peer
field.help: Verify that the certificate received from the server is valid and trusted by one of the installed certificate authorities (CA cert). Automatically enforced when sending authentication credentials.

field.label: Address capture regular expression
field.help:
The regular expression to capture the returned IP address.
Examples:
 <body>Current IP Address: (.*)</body>
 ^(.*)$

field.label: Interfaces
field.help: The network interfaces to use this service on.

field.label: IP version
field.help: The IP versions to use this service with.

field.label: Username
field.help: The username to authenticate with the service.

field.label: Password
field.help: The password to authenticate with the service.

field.label: Authentication type
field.help: The authentication type to use for sending login credentials to the service.

field.label: Description
field.help: A description for administrative reference (not parsed).
